title: When Love Awaits
description: Once Lady Leonie cursed the hated "Black Wolf" for his cruelty and legendary dark deeds. But now she must marry the magnificent villain to bring peace to the land. Rolfe d'Ambert, the mercenary Lord of Kempston, would have taken a rare prize like the exquisite Leonie as his wife under any circumstance yet it is revenge that inspires their union. But with one kiss, she has done the unthinkable and captured the notorious wolf, enflaming an irresistible desire within him to claim her body and soul, and a need to ignite a fire hot enough to eternally join two warring hearts.
author: Johanna Lindsey
